answer:
You can contact your local public health unit to make an appointment for your children to get caught up on any missing vaccines. You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here. 
- Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## You can contact your local public health unit to make an appointment for your children to get caught up on any missing vaccines.

You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here.
- Immunization Nurse
question: My child in grade nine was away from school today and has not gotten his shots, what do I do? I just found out that my daughter didn't get hers either she is in grade 11 now can she still get hers too?
question_variation_0: do my daughter need her shots if i dont get hers
question_variation_1: does my child get shots at school
question_variation_2: when does a child in grade nine get shots
